lead_paragraph: Serie A's disciplinary committee has turned Sassuolo's 2-1 win over Pescara on Sunday into a 3-0 defeat because of irregularities in the registration of midfielder Antonino Ragusa.

headline.print_headline: Sassuolo Win Over Pescara Turned Into 3-0 Defeat
headline.main: Sassuolo Win Over Pescara Turned Into 3-0 Defeat

snippet: Serie A's disciplinary committee has turned Sassuolo's 2-1 win over Pescara on Sunday into a 3-0 defeat because of irregularities in the registration of midfielder Antonino Ragusa....
